name: BAD END THEATER - Game + OST
description:
This bundle includes the game and original soundtrack DLC


welcome to BAD END THEATER! select your protagonist and explore a variety of terrible fates!

the decisions you make in one story will affect the others. you can toggle these behaviors to open up new paths! unfortunately, every path leads to a bad ending...

can you find a way to save this unlucky cast?

playtime: 1-3 hours to see all endings (it's a puzzle game, so this varies widely)FEATURES 16k words, 600 illustrations, 40+ endingsCREDITS story + art + music - NomnomNami
